member.name: T:XPlat.Storage.Pickers.FileOpenPicker
member.summary: Represents a UI element that lets the user choose and open files.

member.name: M:XPlat.Storage.Pickers.FileOpenPicker.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:XPlat.Storage.Pickers.FileOpenPicker.FileTypeFilter
member.summary: Gets the collection of file types that the file open picker displays.

member.name: M:XPlat.Storage.Pickers.FileOpenPicker.PickSingleFileAsync
member.summary: Shows the file picker so that the user can pick one file.
member.returns: When the call to this method completes successfully, it returns a StorageFile object that represents the file that the user picked.

member.name: M:XPlat.Storage.Pickers.FileOpenPicker.PickMultipleFilesAsync
member.summary: Shows the file picker so that the user can pick multiple files. (Windows Store app)
member.returns: When the call to this method completes successfully, it returns a filePickerSelectedFilesArray object that contains all the files that were picked by the user. Picked files in this array are represented by storageFile objects.

member.name: T:XPlat.Storage.Pickers.IFileOpenPicker
member.summary: Represents a UI element that lets the user choose and open files.

member.name: P:XPlat.Storage.Pickers.IFileOpenPicker.FileTypeFilter
member.summary: Gets the collection of file types that the file open picker displays.

member.name: M:XPlat.Storage.Pickers.IFileOpenPicker.PickSingleFileAsync
member.summary: Shows the file picker so that the user can pick one file.
member.returns: When the call to this method completes successfully, it returns a StorageFile object that represents the file that the user picked.

member.name: M:XPlat.Storage.Pickers.IFileOpenPicker.PickMultipleFilesAsync
member.summary: Shows the file picker so that the user can pick multiple files. (Windows Store app)
member.returns: When the call to this method completes successfully, it returns a filePickerSelectedFilesArray object that contains all the files that were picked by the user. Picked files in this array are represented by storageFile objects.
